Title: Relates to the conversion of condominium ownership for the preservation of expiring affordable housing in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to the conversion to condominium ownership for the preservation of expiring affordable housing in the city of New York; provides expanded homeownership opportunities from the conversion of certain residential rental buildings to condominium status by property owners that commit to preserve the inventory of expiring affordable housing in the city of New York; establishes the housing protection unit fund.
LawCode: Add §352-eeeee, amd §§352-e & 352-eeee, Gen Bus L; amd §339-e, add §339-mm, RP L; add §80-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the real property law, and the state finance law, in relation to providing expanded homeownership opportunities from the conversion of certain residential rental buildings to condominium status by property owners that commit to preserve the inventory of expiring affordable housing in the city of New York
